attributes.action: Provide adequate flood defenses and support to all UK areas flooded in 2015.
attributes.additional_details:
Floods in:

Cumbria
Greater Manchester 
Lancashire 
Scotland 
Yorkshire
attributes.background:
The Government should not decide the total it will spend on flood defenses and support until they have properly costed what is needed.  
We have a national crisis and the Government should reduce or suspend foreign aid to fund the above, until its own country and its own people are protected.
